definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Compensation method was used to eliminate disturbance of coexisting element titanium.
sentences.chinese: 以補償法消除共存元素鈦對鈣的測定干擾。

sentences.english: In male flowers, style cells containing no calcium precipitation soon began to degenerate.
sentences.chinese: 缺乏鈣沉澱顆粒的雄花花柱細胞迅速解體。

sentences.english: The compatibilities of molybdenum dialkyldithiocarbamateand Cacompounds in greases were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了氨基甲酸鉬和鈣化合物在潤滑脂中的配伍性。

sentences.english: Patients with hypoproteinemia or prolonged prothrombin time(PT) were often accompanied by hypocalcemia.
sentences.chinese: 低蛋白血癥和PT延長的病例伴有低血鈣較常見。

sentences.english: This paper analyzes the X-ray diagnosis of 7 cases of milky renal stone.
sentences.chinese: 結合7例腎鈣乳，就x線診斷問題進行了討論。

sentences.english: Calcium formate may offer significant advantages as a dietary calcium supplement.
sentences.chinese: 提示甲酸鈣可能是一種極有優勢的鈣補充劑。

sentences.english: Calcium formate may offer significant advantages as a dietary calcium supplement.
sentences.chinese: 提示甲酸鈣可能是一種極有優勢的鈣補充劑。

sentences.english: Effects of calcium on chilling resistance of radish cotyledons were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了鈣對蘿蔔子葉抗寒性的影響。

sentences.english: Did not occur in patients with postoperative hypocalcemia.
sentences.chinese: 患者術後均未出現低鈣血癥。

sentences.english: The other objective of this research is to seek the probability of using slag to replace wollastonite .
sentences.chinese: 同時並探討以爐石取代鈣矽石之可能性。

sentences.english: This paper had a study on the Ca strengthener about soy sauce.
sentences.chinese: 本文用幾種鈣強化劑對醬油進行了鈣強化研究。

sentences.english: This paper had a study on the Ca strengthener about soy sauce.
sentences.chinese: 本文用幾種鈣強化劑對醬油進行了鈣強化研究。

sentences.english: Vitamin K is an essential co-factor in calcium absorption and retention.
sentences.chinese: 維生素K，鈣的吸收和保留的合作是一個重要的因素。

sentences.english: Good food should raise calcic content to reduce phosphorous content.
sentences.chinese: 理想的飲食應提高鈣含量降低磷的含量。

sentences.english: Barite usually contain strontium and calcium.
One indicator is the levels of calcium and aragonite.
sentences.chinese: 其中一個就是水體中的鈣和霰石的水平。

definition: to absorb (nutrients etc)/to assimilate/intake/to take a photograph of (a scene)
